translation:
Citizen

Since the Government received the letter by copy, which on the 11th of the past month you addressed to the citizen Dr. Judge of Law of that District, to whom you refused to obey as Chief of Police of the same; and having agreed with the measure taken by the General-in-chief of the army, ordering that the aforementioned Dr. Judge of Law resume the functions of General Chief of District Police, seeing that this provision is in accordance with the laws of the Empire of Brazil, which we provisionally follow; it commands us to consider you dismissed from the said position of General Chief of Police of this department, which you have performed with such honor: this I communicate to you for your knowledge and due execution.

God keep you. Secretariat of Justice in Alegrete, September 27, 1842. To citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. José Pedroso de Albuquerque.

Secretariat of the Republic Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães — Boqueirão. From the Minister of Justice. Letter from the Minister of Justice giving me my dismissal.
